price: 43. Iyagoo horay u degdegaya (si ay u ajiibaan baaqaha), madaxyadoodu kor u taagan yihiin13, uusan soo noqoneyn arragooda (taagmi indhahu), quluubtoodu- na maran tahay (cabsi darteed).
arabic: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ
footnotes: 13. Tani waa xaaladdooda marka laga soo saaro qubuurahooda. Madaxyadooda kor yihiin iyagoo aan meelna jalleeceyn argagax darteed, aan awoodin xitaa inay dib dhugtaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: muh'ṭiʿīna muq'niʿī ruūsihim lā yartaddu ilayhim ṭarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawāon
